page.title: 11HOMES GOBOWEN & WESTON RHYN
page.content: In our survey of 200{homes,}123 replies were received. Most people lived in semi detached houses(59) and 19 of these were owned by Oswestry Borough Council and 39 people owned their own homes. Forty five were three bedroomed houses. The{detached}houses (39) were mainly owner occupied(33), three were rented and three council owned.One farm had ten bedrooms but most were three bedroomed(25) Other homes,{cottages(7), bungalows(5) and{terraced (8)}were mainly{council owned and either two or three bedroomed. Ninety-one homes owned a telephone installed by British Telecom.
